document.full_text: chinese authorities found three companies linked to google inc broke tax rules and are investigating possible tax avoidance, a chinese state-run newspaper said on thursday, raising the risk of fresh pressure on the internet search giant.
document.title: china report claims google-linked firms broke rules
lines_and_colors: chinese authorities found three companies linked to google inc broke tax rules and are investigating possible tax avoidance, a chinese state-run newspaper said on thursday, raising the risk of fresh pressure on the internet search giant.
